reviews.review: DBD服务器，延迟得不到解决。

I really used to love this game back on release. I put hundreds of hours into it and had a great time. But its was very clear to me that the Devs are either incompetent or purposely deliver a half-baked product to make a quick buck. I have gave them multiple chances over the last 3 years . I have came back and played a bit only to see the same issues plaguing the game that were there when I left. So please take this from someone who put almost 3500 hour in during the first two years:


Don't play this game. This game has been one of the worst experiences I have ever had in a video game. 


1. They allowed infinites to be in the game for months after launch. Then they clam that infinites take some skill. Even after almost 6 years there are still soft infinites on maps even after overhauls have been done.
2. They have allowed game breaking bugs to be in the game for months and not done a single thing about it. The biggest offender of this was during Christmas 2016. They allowed perk stacking and Chainsaw Myers to be in the game for 2 months all because they were on Christmas break. They allowed Nurse to be bugged for 3 weeks when blinking around killer shack. Borrowed Time was bugged for a single night and hotfixed the next day.
3. They have released broken content and patches multiple times for years now. Every time something comes out it is broken and sometimes borderline unplayable/unusable. (Keep in mind that they are charging money for these things). Killers not working right for weeks after launch or perks not doing what they have in the description.
4. The balancing of this game is the ABSOLUTE worse I have ever seen in any video game. They refuse to change obvious things about killers or perks. They routinely release busted killers and kneecap them a few weeks later. Freddy was one of the worst killer for YEARS after he was nerfed weeks after his release. They have also opted to nerf killers that have skill expression because console players can't do them like PC players. The Nurse had a cooldown added to her kit because it was easier to do that then expand on her fatigue mechanic that she WAS balanced around. There are many killers such as Hag, Pig, Clown and Leatherface that were terrible for years after their release. Then they are finally reworked only to be kneecapped so after. Some killers are just not allowed to be good in the eyes of BHVR.
5. The Devs would rather make a quick buck then make the community happy. The amount of overpriced cosmetics in the store is absurd. Many of those more expensive outfits you can't even customize with other pieces of clothes. A $15 cosmetic in a game where I have to spend hundreds of dollars on to get all the killer and perks is ridiculous. You are forced to spend money on chapters all because one of the perks is the best in the game and the rest of the chapter is underpowered or broken content. It's even more obvious with them trying to sell NFTs. They are trying to get casual players to buy these just because they are DbD related.

This game is nothing but a cash grab by greedy Devs who know they can use Horror icons to get people to spend money on overpriced chapters and cosmetics where most of the product doesn't work.

Was starting to get burnt out of the game as mostly a survivor main, but during the most recent double currency event, I also bought all the DLCs that included characters while they were on sale. I started playing killer and started to enjoy it again almost immediately, especially since I had bought a lot of the useful 'teachable' perks while playing survivor. I leveled several different killers and had a lot of fun playing them and learning how their unique powers worked.

The game's basic characters that you start with are somewhat boring to play, and don't really have the best perks to start with, so if you're interested in this game it would be a good idea to buy some DLCs with it when they're on sale.

Dead by Daylight is a really fun game, and there are plenty of reviews out there that describe its pros and cons. A lot of people complain that this game's unbalanced, or unfair, but what they don't consider is that the devs are ALWAYS updating it. This game is ALWAYS getting update. All the time. Sometimes several patches in a day. Absolutely constantly. Taking that into consideration, if you like the premise of Dead by Daylight, then take the plunge and buy it. At $20, it's not going to break the bank--especially so if you grab it on sale--and it'll provide hours of fun.

I love dead by daylight it is a great game, here are 5 reason why you should play 
1. A good horror game: if you want to be scare, play this.
2. A funny game: it is funny when you play around with the killer, jukeing him or her. 
3. Jumpscare: if you dont watch out, the killer can come of of nowhere and scare you for a laugh.
4. Killers: when you play as killer, it is fun to scare them or play around.
5. Players: if you play with your friend as the killer play around and have a good laugh.
That is why you sould get the game, even though it is $20.00, it is worth it.

Finale Rezension:

Ich spiele Dead by Daylight schon seit Release und kenne daher die Stärken und Schwächen dieses Games. Ich für meinen Teil bin fertig mit dem Game und kann auch nur jedem ans Herz legen, dieses auch zu droppen. Das Problem was Dead by Daylight hat ist kaum mehr zu fixen, da die Richtung schon lange eingeschlagen wurde. Es wurde nur für casual Spieler gebalanced und daher können erfahrenere Spieler dies ausnutzen. Second Chance Perks sind ein gutes Beispiel für dieses ,,falsche Balance". Mit dem MMR System haben die inkompetenten Devs alles noch schlimmer gemacht, da man Killer nun kaum mehr spielen kann, außer man kann es ab, ständig zu verlieren und schikaniert zu werden von den Survivorn. SoloQ Survivor zu spielen macht auch keinen Spaß, da man nicht mal die Perks seiner Teammates einsehen kann am Anfang vom Match. So kann man auch keine noob Lobbys dodgen. Viele Spieler haben weit über 1000 Stunden und spielen immer noch wie die größten Bots die das Game neu gekauft haben. Letztendlich ist es auch die toxische Community, die Dead by Daylight ruiniert. Nach über 2000 Std. kann ich nur sagen, dass es immer schlimmer mit dem Game wird und nur noch casuals berücksichtigt werden. Tut euch einen Gefallen und zockt das Game nicht!
el dlc de halloween lo mejor..!

It feels like a bade console port, despite being a PC exclusive game. The developers' grasp on competitive balance seems tenuous and the balance changes and updates show it. The community is toxic, with both survivors and killers raging over any perceived slight, no matter how minimal.

That said, game is just plain fun to play. It's a good game, and if the problems get improved, it could be a great game.

Dead by waiting to join a fucking lobby 10/10

Dead by Daylight ist ein Spiel, bei dem man Nerven aus Stahl haben muss. Die Killer sind alle super ausgeglichen und die jeweiligen Charaktere sind auch alle ganz unterschiedlich im Blutnetz. Die Ladezeiten haben sich sehr verbessert als zu vorherigen Zeiten. Schade ist manchmal nur, dass es immer wieder der selbe Spielemodus ist. Das könnte man noch ein bisschen ausschmücken. Das selbe in grün bei den Killern und den Maps. Da kann schon mal was neues kommen. ;)
ABER:
Ein großer Kritikpunkt, meiner Meinung nach, ist der neue Killer "Der Wandler" aus dem "The Halloween-Chapter" Update. Der Typ ist einfach zu OP wie ich finde und macht teilweise das Spiel unspielbar, weil viele Perks einfach nicht auf den Typen reagieren wie sie einfach sollten. Die Spezialfähigkeit ist auch einfach zu übertrieben. Die müsste sich mit der Zeit einfach lamgsam wieder reduzieren.
Ansonsten kann man das Spiel nur empfehlen. Es bringt Spannung, Spaß und eine Vielzahl an Möglichkeiten mit sich um deine Freunde die letzten Nerven zu rauben. :D  In dem Sinne geiles Spiel. :)
Schönes Spiel was man gut mit Freunden spielen kann :)

Miglior Horror in assoluto.
Comprato a sconto per 14€ e li vale tutti!
Facendola breve: 
Ci sono due tipi di partita
A: Dove sei un sopravvissuto e con altri 3 giocatori devi accendere dei generatori per aprire dei cancelli e scappare
B: Sei tu il KILLER e devi impedire ciò!

Le sensazioni che trasmette il gioco sono perfette,il gameplay è vario,la grafica davvero buona e molti perk a disposizione.
Lati negativi? Per adesso 3 mappe (senza dlc) e pochi personaggi di entrambe le fazioni.
In oltre qualche bug qua e la ma niente di cosi sconvolgente.

Voto? 8,5

Dead by day light é um jogo apenas com multiplayer, extremamente viciante. Com alguns sustos contra monstrões específicos.

Prós:
-Muito Divertido
-Bom Sistema de Ranking

Contras:
-Alguns Bugs aqui e ali
-As vezes é estressante


No geral o jogo é bom, fica muito melhor jogando em party com amigos, comprando você e mais 2 da pra jogar algumas rankeadas legais, comprando 5 pessoas da pra fechar uma party e se divertir matando e escapando dos amigos.

Dou um 8/10 pra esse jogo.

it feels like it's almost been a year since i panned a bad review on dead by daylight, based on some toxicity from the playerbase and i'm here to say after giving it another fair chance after a slew of updates it finally seems really well balanced, and the player base in general seems alot more friendly. i recently picked this game backed up and i'm actually having quite a bit of fun, both as survivor and killer. it seems the devs and playerbase are genuinely interested in making the game the best it can be for its premise. in it's current state, this game is genuinely fun and fair, just try not to get too salty and remember it's meant to be asymmetrical, but above all remember that no matter which side you are on (killer/survivor) each side is rewarded for being as crafty and devious as they can be, if you remember everyone is here to have fun dead by daylight is probably the best cat and mouse experience you can purchase
fun game!
Fun and addictive game

Have you always wanted to be a killer? To endlessly murder all your friends?

Have you always felt like you were always leaning towards hanging the very same group of friends and sacrifice them to the spider gods?

Well you got issues, my friend...

And THAT is why YOU should get this game!


...Unless you're the victim...then in that case, I'd recommend reevaluating your relationship with the dedicated killers you hang out with.

---------------------

No, but seriously, this game is very well done, and fun within a group of friends, playing with randoms isn't so bad, but sometimes it can be nerve grinding when survivors who you thought were your allies, turns out to be the bane of your existence.

10/10

This game has a very high learning curve depending on the killers you meet the first 20 or 40 games. 

If you wanna start this game with the best chance at surviving I recommend leveling up claudette or meg first.

Learn the sudden jukes by watching tons of videos or streamers.  This game is like 80 mind games and 20 perks.

You level up killers and survivors by scoring blood points in 4 different categories.

As a killer I highly recommend to start with the Billy since he can really clutch with his chainsaw. Or the wraith with invisibility.

See you in the fog

Игра! В очень жестокие прятки! Убежать не успел? По хребту получил.

1. Enter match as survivor

2. Carefully sneak around without being seen

3. Hear in the distance your friends being murdered

4. Finish the minimum amount of generators as they die around you and you hide in a bush

5. Find trap door and escape alone

6. Calm your heart rate and go again

This is my new addiction.  It is easy to fall into the clutches and play until...damn, it's four am AGAIN.  They have balanced the game recently, which has helped hunters play as true hunters again.  Not thrilled I have poured so many hours into this, and now to have the easier bloodline, but it is still a great game, and one that is great to play, whether hunter or survivor.  

Basically this is an adult playground killer hide and go seek.  When I first played, I was actually scared.  The beating of the heart, trying to run for your life and then ending up on the hook...it's an adrenaline rush.  

All in all this is a great game that you will find yourself pouring more and more time into, highly recommend.  x

Dead by Daylight экий хоррор с хорошим гейплеем и неплохим набором игровых персонажей(которых побольшой степени надо покупать,идо на одно бесплатное DLC выходит 2-3 платных) и карт.Так-же есть COOP, неплохая система прокачки, кастомная часть(в основном на выживших)... Есть конечно и баги и баланс в некоторых ситуациях может быть не равен(куда без этого), но всё равно играбельный продукт.   7,5/10

[2016]
Nach meinen Spielstunden kann ich nun auch sagen, ja ich liebe dieses Spiel.
Klar es hat ordentliche Balance Probleme.
Aber davon mal abgesehen, ist es einfach super.
Ich spiele es auf beiden Seiten. Sowohl Killer als auch Survivor.
Beide Seiten haben ihre Vor- und Nachteile.
Rage'n liegt an der Tagesordnung und sich erschrecken ebenso.
Ein super Spiel mit dem ich viele Nächte verbracht habe und weiterhin verbringen werde.

Update [2017]:
Auch heute noch mit meinen 1.800 Stunden spiele ich es sehr gern.
Einziger wehmut mittlerweile (Auch wenn keine muss)
Alle DLC zusammen kosten viel mehr als das ganze Spiel.

Update [2018]:
Immer noch eines meiner Lieblingsspiele, der neue InGame Shop ist auch ganz okay, 
jedoch gefällt mir nicht, dass man nicht jedes Item mit spielen freischalten kann, 
sondern bei manchen gezwungen wäre diese mit Echtgeldwährung zu erkaufen.

Update [2019]:
Immer noch geiles Spiel!
